actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To restore 10-year averaging and capital gains treatment for lump sum distributions from qualified pension plans.

summary.text: Repeals certain provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to restore the ten-year averaging and capital gains treatment for lump sum distributions from qualified pension plans.

titles.title: To restore 10-year averaging and capital gains treatment for lump sum distributions from qualified pension plans.
